action.action-desc: Mrs. Noem introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Agriculture

form.official-title: To establish an Office of Tribal Relations in the Department of Agriculture.

subsection.text: Title III of the Department of Agriculture Reorganization Act of 1994 is amended by adding after section 308 (7 U.S.C. 3125a note; Public Law 103–354) the following new section:

section.text: The Secretary shall establish in the Office of the Secretary an Office of Tribal Relations to advise the Secretary on policies related to Indian tribes.

subsection.text: Section 296(b) of the Department of Agriculture Reorganization Act of 1994 (7 U.S.C. 7014(b)) is amended—

paragraph.text: in paragraph (6)(C), by striking or at the end;
in paragraph (7), by striking the period at the end and inserting ; or; and
by adding at the end the following new paragraph:
the authority of the Secretary to establish in the Office of the Secretary the Office of Tribal Relations in accordance with section 309.
